title: Michelin - worldwide number of employees by region 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Region in the x axis and Number of employees in the y axis.
The maximum Number of employees 70599.0 is found at Region Europe and the minimum is found at Africa India Middle-East where Region is 1848.0.
The highest Region Europe has 68751.0 more Number of employees than the lowest Region Africa India Middle-East.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Region, and Number of employees in each Region on the y axis.
The Number of employees is appeared to be the highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region Africa India Middle-East.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Region in the x axis and Number of employees in the y axis.
The maximum Number of employees 70599.0 is found at Region Europe and the minimum is found at Africa India Middle-East where Region is 1848.0.
The highest Region Europe has 68751.0 more Number of employees than the lowest Region Africa India Middle-East.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employees for 5 number of Regions.
The maximum Number of employees 70599.0 is found at Region Europe and the minimum is found at Africa India Middle-East where Region is 1848.0.
Region North America has the second highest value for Number of employees.
Region Europe has 38.2 times more Number of employees than Region Africa India Middle-East which is has the lowest.
Number of employees at Region Europe is 70599.0 , second place is North America at 21541.0, and thirdly is Asia (excl. India) at 15259.0.
Considered together, the average Number of employees in all 5 Regions is roughly 23482.6.
The Number of employees is 117413.0 if we add up values of all Regions.
